extendedInfo.description: Your Marion County Public Library System in Fairmont, West Virginia is in the palm of your hands.  Search for ebooks, books, DVDs, audiobooks, music and more.  Place holds or renew items, access your account, access our many databases--we are here for you!  Stay on top of library events throughout all library locations; you have your library service at your fingertips, 24/7.  You can even download our latest e-titles straight to your device.  We have over 15,000 popular downloadable books, audios, music and videos on WVDELI.   Take your library with you wherever you go.

reviews.title: Awesome!!!!
reviews.comment: I mostly rely on this application to do all of the things I need to do with my library account. You can request, renew, place things on hold, and everything else you can imagine needing from the library! Obviously this is also the best way to download audio and electronic books.  The only problem I\'ve had is that one time I renewed my books via this application, and they did not renew on the library\'s actual system. I always double check now to make sure that they actually renewed. Not one single prob since
reviews.author: Teresa Pollack
